data: NICU Diazoxide Administration for Management of Persistent Hypoglycemia (Module)

diazoxide 5 to 15 mg/kg/day divided into three doses:  
- 1.7 mg/kg/dose q8h = 5 mg/kg/day  
- 2.5 mg/kg/dose q8h = 7.5 mg/kg/day  
- 3.3 mg/kg/dose q8h = 10 mg/kg/day  
- 4.2 mg/kg/dose q8h = 12.5 mg/kg/day  
- 5 mg/kg/dose q8h = 15 mg/kg/day
1.7 mg/kg, PO, q8h interval, drug form: oral liq
2.5 mg/kg, PO, q8h interval, drug form: oral liq
3.3 mg/kg, PO, q8h interval, drug form: oral liq
4.2 mg/kg, PO, q8h interval, drug form: oral liq
5 mg/kg, PO, q8h interval, drug form: oral liq
1 mg/kg, PO, q12h interval, drug form: oral liq
Blood, Urgent, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, once

Whole Blood, Urgent, Collection: T;N, once
Blood, Urgent, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, once
Blood, Timed, Unit collect, Collection: T+1;N, once
